subtitleNullable: 150K news articles about Sri Lanka from Dailynews and Newsfirst.
descriptionNullable: ### Description This dataset contains a set of news articles scraped from [Dailymirror](https://www.dailymirror.lk/) and [Newsfirst](https://www.newsfirst.lk/); two prominent Sri Lankan news websites. ### Copyright *Articles: The ownership of the articles belongs to the original owners from which this data was scraped.* *Dataset image: © UNSPLASH/Alex Azabache* ### Citations If you use this data in any research work / publication, please cite this dataset as, > Oshan Mudannayake. (2022). Sri Lanka News Dataset [Data set]. Kaggle. https://doi.org/10.34740/KAGGLE/DS/2284378
